body:
Hi,


When using ranimate I noticed that after ranimate finished all jobs on 
localhost and other multiprocessor machines in the network (using ssh), 
all memory used by rpict  remains unuseable. The only solution to free 
memory is rebooting the machine(s). Is this a known issue?


-Iebele
___
